displaying-data.title: Displaying Data
displaying-data.intro: In Angular, we display data by binding component properties to elements in HTML templates using interpolation and other forms of Property Binding.

user-input.title: User Input
user-input.intro: DOM events drive user input in Angular. You can use the native events like click, mouseover, and keyup. Angular uses a special syntax to register events to DOM elements. This section covers all the ins and outs of using the event syntax.
